live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

63851.summary: Some customers in West Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63851.title: July 11 - West Kelowna | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

63853.summary: Some customers in the Empire Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63853.title: July 11 - Edmonton (Empire Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
